knimeNode.name: PetrinetWriter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Read a model from Petrinet.class and Write this Petri net into pnml file

fullDescription.intro:
This nodes writes a PMML model from a petri net model port into a pnml file or to a remote location denoted by an URL.
Note that if the destination location is a remote URL not all options are available because in general it's not possible to determine whether the remote location exists. In this case it will always be overwritten.
fullDescription.option: Enter a valid name or URL

ports.inPort: Petri net model to write to PNML file
